msbt.message: You won't believe this! I found a recipe for a Bunny Day crown!I wouldn't feel right keeping it all to myself, so I want you to have a copy of the recipe too.
There's something so exciting about a new recipe, isn't there?I want to collect lots and lots of eggs and make the most wonderful things, !
Oh no! Are your pockets full? That's too bad.Don't worry. Just let me know when you've got some extra space. I'll give you the recipe then, .
Oh, oh! I'm SO excited! I discovered a recipe for a Bunny Day bag!I couldn't possibly keep this to myself. That would be greedy, ! So instead, I made a copy for you, .
I'm so glad I was able to share it with you. Well, I guess it's time to get egg hunting!
Oh! I guess I can't give it to you right now. Your pockets are full, right? What terrible timing on my partPlease tell me when you have some spare pocket space so I can give you the recipe, !
You wouldn't believe my collection of .You're always so kind. I'd like to share 5 with you! Please take them with my thanks, !
I'm so happy to share these eggs with you. I hope you put them to good use, .

Oh dear! It looks like your pockets are already filled to the brim. Some good stuff in there, no doubt.Please let me know if you manage to free up some space. I'm happy to hold on to these until then.
